must_have: Strong programming skills in Python or other languages like C++ or Java

description:
Machine learning engineer:
designing, building, and deploying AI systems that can learn from data. Key duties include cleaning and preparing data, developing and testing models, optimizing performance, and integrating them into applications for real-world use. This role requires strong programming skills (often in Python) and a solid foundation in math, statistics, and machine learning frameworks. 
Core responsibilities

    Design and build ML systems: Create and prototype AI algorithms and end...
responsibilities: Design and build ML systems: Create and prototype AI algorithms and end-to-end ML systems, from data ingestion to model serving.
Data preparation: Handle data preprocessing, feature engineering, and data cleaning to prepare datasets for model training.
Model development and evaluation: Develop, train, and test machine learning models using various frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.
Deployment and MLOps: Deploy models into production, build scalable ML pipelines, and implement monitoring and retraining strategies to maintain performance.
Collaboration: Work with data scientists, software engineers, and product managers to translate business needs into technical solutions and integrate ML into products.
